Package com.doa.engine

Engine Core.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoaCamera
    Represents a camera construct that looks at a certain point in 2D space, this point can be animate.
    DoaEngine
    Responsible for creating and supplying the graphics context used for drawing all created DoaObjects, and updating all created DoaObjects.
    DoaWindow
    Responsible for providing a windowing tool for DoaEngine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DoaRenderingMode
    Specifies the rendering mode of DoaEngine.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DoaEngineInstanceException
    Thrown when certain DoaEngine parts are tried to be instantiated more than once.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Internal
    Indicates an internal component of DoaEngine exposed to public due to language limitations(lack of internal keyword).
